title: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus is not set on it.
OB: The focus caret is not in the first Combo "Host:".
EB: The focus caret should be in the first Combo "Host:".
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Click on the first Combo.
3. Check if the focus caret is set on the first Combo "Host:".
